text: FYI I don’t see black bars…
Yeah I figured it out over the weekend
Changing the padding on the video
<@U2LEJ045D>, Provide css object-fit:cover; instead of contain then resolved your issue.

Hi team,
I am a beginner with HubSpot CMS, and I have some doubts and questions.
Can I create custom blog posts similar to *Content > Blog*
My question is, can I create more custom posts like *Content > Custom Blog 1*, *Content > Custom Blog 2*, etc.? Please let me know about the possibilities.
go to settings -> content -> blog -> current view dropdown -> create new blog

@*Sam Sharples* Thanks*,*
Is it possible to create new more blogs with a free account?

Can I create multiple blogs with a free account?

For example, could I have a 'Loader' blog with hundreds of posts and an 'Attachment' blog with another hundred posts?
not with a free account, no
You can do it on Sandbox account
any update on this? running into the same issue. we want files access restricted to authenticated contacts.

Hello, for the last year there is a decrease in users sessions on my client's website. I have also noticed that amount of sessions measured by HubSpot and Google Analytics differs a lot, HS is registering much more sessions than GA. Do you know what might be the cause? Does GA measure sessions differently than HS? Have you seen a decrease in your website sessions as well since last year? Although, amount of registered users has increased...
